Automotive Cloud Fields on ApplicationFo.name: Automotive Cloud Fields on ApplicationFormSellerItem
Automotive Cloud Fields on ApplicationFo.description: Standard fields extend the ApplicationFormSellerItem object for use in Automotive Cloud to represent a junction between an application form and an automotive seller product.

AddlProductTermInMonths.description: The duration of the term in months for a seller item that's marked as an additional product related to an application form.

IntendedUse.description: Specifies the intention or purpose of use for a seller item related to an application form.

IsAdditionalProduct.description: Indicates whether a seller item related to an application product is an additional product (true), or not (false).

ItemCondition.description: Specifies the condition of a seller item related to an application form.
